name: Chez Annie
address: 13 Nguyen Khac Can Street, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Set 200 metres from Ba Dinh Square in Hanoi, Chez Annie features free WiFi in all areas. The apartment is 300 metres from Hanoi Opera House.

Featuring French colonial architecture, air-conditioned room is fitted with window offering plenty of sunlight. En suite bathroom comes with shower facility and a washing machine.

The kitchen is equipped with a fridge and an electric kettle.

Trang Tien Plaza and Sofitel Legend Metropole Hotel are 300 metres from Chez Annie, while St. Joseph Cathedral is 950 metres away. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 22 km from the property.
